change.item: This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Records of the Office of the President, 1911-1914

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: University of Arizona. Office of the President.

did.abstract: This collection contains correspondence and financial papers relating to the administration and management of the university. Correspondents include faculty, parents, and others.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: It is the responsibility of the user to obtain permission to publish from the owner of the copyright (the institution, the creator of the record, the author or his/her transferees, heirs, legates, or literary executors). prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Records of the Office of the President (AZ 076). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Arthur H. Wilde; University of Arizona President, 1911-1914.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Correspondence and financial papers relating to the admininstration and management of the university. Correspondents include faculty, parents, and others.

relatedmaterial.p: Additional President's papers at AZ 406, AZ 420, AZ 426, AZ 427.
